Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Sada., Sahu hai upadesa vale kura'ana di
Sagom jinham lokam ne inakara kita uha hathadharami ate hakara vica hana
Isa tom pahilam asim kini'am hi kaumam barabada kara diti'am tam uha pukarana lage ate uha samam bacana da nahim si
Ate unham lokam ne hairani pragata kiti ki unham de kola unham vicom ika dara'una vala a'i'a hai. Ate jhuthala'una vali'am ne kiha ki iha jadugara hai ate jhutha hai
Ki usa ne ine pujanayogam di tham ika pujanayoga bana dita. Iha tam bari anokhi gala hai
Ate unham de saradara utha ke kharhe ho ga'e ki calo ate apane pujanayogam upara jame raho. Iha ko'i matalaba di gala hai
Asim iha gala pichale dharama vica nahim suni. Iha sirafa ika ghari ho'i gala hai
Ki sade sari'am vicom isa bade te hi alaha di bani utari ga'i hai, sagom iha loka mere valom kiti nasihata te saka karade hana. Sagom unham ne huna taka meri saza da savada nahim cakhi'a
Ki tere raba di_rahimata de bhadara unham de kola hana jihara takatavara ate kirapalu hai
Ki akasam, dharati ate unham de vicakara zizam di malaki unham de adhikara vica hai, phira uha pauri'am laga ke carha jana
Ika phauja iha vi ike barabada hovegi sari'am phaujam vicom
Inham tom pahilam nuha di kauma, ada ate mekham vala fira'auna
Firaaaina samuva, luta di kauma ate eka vali'am ne inakara kita. Iha loka vade-vade samuha sana
Unham sari'am ne sulam nu jhuthala'i'a tam meri saza pahuca ke rahi
Ate iha loka sirafa ika caghi'ara di udika vica hana jisa tom ba'ada ko'i dhila nahim
Ate unham ne kiha ki he sade raba! Sada hisa sanu hisaba de dina tom pahilam de ve
Jo kujha uha kahide hana usa ute dhiraja rakho ate sade bade da'uda nu yada karo. Jihara samaratha vala hai ate (apane raba vala) jhukana vala si
Asim paharam nu usa de nala hi vasa vica kara dita ki uha usa de nala hi' savere sama (alaha di) siphata salaha karade sana
Ate pachi'am de jhuda vi alaha hi sifata salaha karana vale sana
Ate asim usa di sata nu sathira kara dita ate usa nu bibeka pradana kita ate mamali'am da phaisala karana di yogata pradana kiti
Ate ki tuhanu khabara pahuci hai mukadama (va'ade) vali'am di jadom ki uha kadha tapa ke ibadata karana vale kamare vica a pahuce

Jadom uha da'uda de kola pahuce tam uha unham tom ghabara gi'a. Unham ne kiha ki apa darom na asim do pakha ham, ika dusare ute ati'acara kita hai'tam apa sade vica saca'i de nala faisala karo, na inasafa na karana ate sanu caga raha dikha'u
Iha mera vada bhara hai isa kola naraî€¼inavem (99) dubi'am (bhedam) hana ate mere kola sirafa ika dubi hai tam uha kahida hai ki iha vi mainu de de ate isa ne gala bata vica mainu dasa li'a

Da'uda ne akhi'a ki isa ne tuhadi durabi nu apani'am dubi'am vica samala karana di maga karake asala vica tuhade upara zulama kita hai. Ate zi'adatara hisedara (sarika) ika duje te zulama karade hana. Paratu jihare imana rakhade hana ate cage karama karade hana ajihe loka bahuta ghata hana. Ate da'uda de mana vica vicara a'i'a ki asim (isa kahani rahim) usada imatihana li'a hai tam usa ne apane raba tom mu'afi magi ate sijade vica diga pi'a (alaha vala) vapisa muri'a
Phira asim usa de papa nu mu'afa kara dita ate besaka sade ithe usa la'i nikatavarati sathana ate caga natija hai

Hai da'uda! Asim tuhanu dharati te khalifa bana'i'a hai tam ki lokam de vicakara inasapha nala faisala karo ate apani icha da palana na karo. Uha tuhanu alaha de raha tom bhataka devegi. Jihare loka alaha de raha tom bhatakade hana unham la'i sakhata saza hai. Isa la'i ki uha hisaba vale dina nu bhule rahe

Ate asim dharati te akasam ate jihara inham vicakara hai binham kise makasada tom paida nahim kita. Iha unham lokam da bharama hai, jinham ne inakara kita isa la'i jinham ne inakara kita unham la'i aga nala vinasa hai
Ki asim unham lokam nu jihare imana li'a'e ate cage karama kite, unham varage kara devange jihare dharati vica vigara paida karana vale hana jam asim sadacari'am nu duracari'am varaga kara devange
Iha ika barakata vali kitaba hai, jihari asim tuhade vala utari hai, tam jo loka isa di'am a'itam te vicara karana ate tam ki budhi vale isa tom gi'ana prapata karana
Ate asim da'uda nu sulemana pradana kita. Saravasresata bada, apane raba vala bahuta jhukana vala
Jadom sama de vakhata unham de sahamane vadhi'a nasala de teza daurana vale ghaure hazira kite ga'e
Tam usa ne akhi'a saim ja'idada de prema nu apane raba de simarana nalom mitara bana'i'a. Ithom taka ki ghore ol'he ho ga'e
(Usa ne adesa dita) unham nu mere kola vapisa li'a'o. Phira unham di'am latam ate garadanam te hatha pherana lagi'a
Ate asim sulemana da imatihana li'a ate asim usa de sighasana te ika dhara rakha dita phira uha parati'a
Usa ne akhi'a hai mere palanahara! Mainu mu'afa kara de ate mainu ajiha raja bakhasa de jihara mere tom ba'ada kise la'i vi sobhanika na hove, besaka tu bahuta dena vala hai
Tam asim hava nu usa di agi'akara bana dita. Ate uha usa de hukama nala nimarata vica udhara caladi si jidhara
uha cahuda si. Ate asim jinam nu vi usade agi'akara bana dita ate hara tar'ham de niramana karana vale ate gotakhora
Ate dusare jihare jaziram vica jakare ho'e rahide sana
Iha sada kita ho'i'a upakara hai tam cahe behisaba isa nu devo jam roko
Ate usa la'i sade nere sathana hai ate bahuta sohani salama
Ate sade bade ayubaî€¼ nu yada karom jadom usa ne apane raba nu pukari'a ki saitana ne mainu dukha ate afata vica pa dita hai
Apana paira maro. Iha thada pani hai isanana la'i ate pina la'i
Ate asim usa nu usa da parivara pradana kita ate apane valom unham budhi vali'am la'i rahimata ate upakara de rupa vica hora vi sahuta kujha bakhasisa kita
Ate apane hakam vica sikham da ika gucha (jharu) lavo ate usa nala marom ate sahu na toro. Besaka asim usa nu dhiraja vala pa'i'a, uha bahuta sohana bada si apane raba vala jhukana vala
Ate he sade badi'o! Ibarahima, isahaka ate yakuba nu yada karo, uha hatham ate akham vale sana
Asim unham nu ika visesa gala de nala khasa bana'i'a ki uha praloka de ghara di yada tom sakhana si
Ate uha sade ithe cune ho'e neka lokam vicom hai
Ate isama'ila ate ala-yasa'a ate zulakifala nu yada karom. Sare neka lokam vicom sana
Iha upadesa hai, besaka alaha tom darana vali'am la'i caga tikana hai
Hamesam la'i baga honage jinham de daravaze inham la'i khul'he rahinage
Iha unham vica sar'hana laga ke baithe honage. Ate bahuta sare fala ate pina vale padaratha magade honage
Unham de kola saramili'am ate barabara umara di'am patani'am honagi'am
Iha hai, uha ciza jisa da tuhade nala hisaba de dina a'una te va'ada kita janda hai
Iha sadi rozi hai jihari kade khatama nahim hona vali
Iha gala ho cuki ate vidarohi'am la'i bura tikana hai
Naraka, uha usa vica dakhala honage tam kiho jiha iha bura sathana hai
Ithe khaul'hada ho'i'a pani ate pika (radha) hai, tam huna iha loka isa nu cakhanage
Ate isa tar'ham di'am dusari'am hora vi vasatu'am honagi'am
Iha ika jo phauja tuhade vica dakhila ho rahi hai, usa la'i ko'i savagata nahim uha aga vica paina vale hana
Uha kahinage sagom tusim, tuhade la'i ko'i savagata nahim'. Tusi' tam iha sade sahamane li'a'e ho tam kiho jiha mara tikana hai iha
Uha kahinage ki he sade palanahara! Jihara bada isa nu sade sahamane li'a'i'a. Usa nu tu naraka vica dugani saza de
Ate uha kahinage ki gala hai ki asim unham lokam nu ithe nahim dekha rahe jinham nu asim bure lokam vica gini'a karade si
Ki asim unham da mazaka bana li'a si jam unham tom nazaram cuka rahi'am hana
Besaka iha gala saci hai naraka vali'am da apisa vica jhagarana
Akho, ki maim tam ika dara'una vala ham hora ko'i pujanayoga nahim, paratu ika alaha zoravara tom' binham
Uha palanahara hai, akasam, dharati ate unham cizam da jihari'am inham de vicakara hana. Uha takatavara ate mu'afa karana vala hai
Akho, ki iha ika vadi khabara hai
Jisa tom tusim asavadhana ho rahe ho
Mainu praloka di kujha vi khabara nahim si jadom ki uha apisa vica jhagara kara rahe sana
Mere kola tam vahi sirafa isa la'i a'undi hai ki maim ika sapasata dara'una vala ham
Jadom' tuhade raba ne farisati'am nu kiha, ki maim miti tom ika manukha bana'una vala ham
Phira jadom maim usa nu thika kara lavam ate usa vica apani atama phuka devam tam tusim usa de age sijade vica lame pai jana
So sare farisati'am ne sijada kita
Paratu ibalisa ne hakara kita ate uha avagi'a karana vali'am vicom ho gi'a

Farama'i'a ki he ibalisa! Tainu kisa ciza ne roka dita hai ki tu isa nu sijada nahim kita, jisa nu maim apane dovam hatham nala bana'i'a. Iha tu hakara kita hai jam tu vade daraje vali'am vicom samajhada hai
Usa ne akhi'a ki maim adama tom utama ham. Tu mainu aga ate isa nu miti tom paida kita hai
Farama'i'a ki tu ithom nikala ja ki'unki tu phitakari'a ho'i'a haim
Ate tere upara badale de dina taka mere valom lahanata hai
Ibalisa ne kiha ki he mere palanahara! Mainu usa dina taka mauka de jadom loka phira cuke janage
Farama'i'a ki tainu mauka dita gi'a
Ika mithe ho'e samem taka
usa ne akhi'a ki tere sanamana di sahu maim unham sari'am nu bhataka ke rahanga
Sil'ham tere unham badi'am de jinham na tu pavitara kara li'a hai
Farama'i'a tam saca'i iha hai ate maim' saca him kahida ham
Ki maim naraka nu tainu ate unham sare lokam nala bhara devanga jihare unham vicom tera palana karanage
Akho, ki maim isa la'i tere tom ko'i badala nahim magada ate na hi maim sakoca karana vali'am vicom ham
Iha tam sirafa sasara vali'am la'i ika upadesa hai
Ate tusim jaladi him usa di diti khabara nu samajha lavauge
